r.d: Numeral captcha generates mathematical operations and answers in order to prove that bots using it are human
r.n: -Added interface support - Fixed tests units - Documentation page setup at: http://dev.agoraproduction.com/pear/numeral/ - End user documentation on pear is setup. - Fix according to comments, added a return in order to prevent code execution - changed my set* to generate because they really are generators after all - no more recursion by generating another operation. - no more double casting. - now using it's own package, not depending on Text_CAPTCHA in order to gain in speed.
